answers.answer: HELLO, I HAVE BEEN TAKING METFORMIN FOR YEARS NOW, BUT FOR DIABETES NOT WEIGHT LOSS. I HAD NO IDEA IT WAS ALSO USED FOR WEIGHT CONTROL.FOR ME IT IS TO HELP MY BLOOD SUGAR LEVELS. IT HAS HAD NO EFFECT AT ALL ON MY PERIOD.

Is this approved by your doctor?  Metformin can apparently help weight loss in obese people with non insulin dependent diabetes, but if you don't fall into that category, it's maybe not such a good idea.  If your doctor ordered it, then that's up to them.It looks like it may have an effect for people with PCOS (data seem to be mixed), but I don't think it would affect your period.  Ask a doctor or pharmacist if you need to know more.

question: iam using metformin for wait loss .are there any effects on my meriod??????
title: metformin
